com.siperian.sif.message.mrm

Class PreviewBvtRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.SiperianRequest
      • com.siperian.sif.message.SiperianObjectRequest
        • com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.PreviewBvtRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SiperianObjectUidProvider, Serializable

    public class PreviewBvtRequest
extends SiperianObjectRequest
implements SiperianObjectUidProvider
    Before doing a merge, preview what a BO record would look like if a given set of records were merged or pending updates applied. Required Parameters:
    • SiperianObjectUid - type and name of the base object or package to be used
    • RecordKeyList - keys for records to get BVT Preview. If there are multiple records in the list, it will show BVT Preview on resulting first BO record.
    • OR FilterClause and a single record in RecordKeyList to preview the effect of applying pending updates
    Usage Example: The following example shows merge preview of three records with ROWID_OBJECTs 1,2, and 3 into a record with ROWID_OBJECT = 1 using the package P_PARTY.
    PreviewBvtRequest request = new PreviewBvtRequest ();
    request.setSiperianObjectUid(SiperianObjectType.PACKAGE.makeUid("C_PARTY"));
    ArrayList recordKeys = new ArrayList();
    recordKeys.add(RecordKey.rowid("1"));
    recordKeys.add(RecordKey.rowid("2"));
    recordKeys.add(RecordKey.rowid("3"));
    request.setRecordKeyList (recordKeys);
    PreviewBvtResponse response = sipClient.process(request);
    See Also:
    MultiMergeRequest, MultiMergeResponse, GetBvtRequest, GetBvtResponse, PreviewBvtResponse, Serialized Form

    API Pair: PreviewBvtResponse

    API Group: Data Retrieval

    • Method Detail

      • getRecordKeyList

        public ArrayList getRecordKeyList()
        See corresponding setter method for details.
        Returns:
        List of RecordKey of the data object that user wants to preview BVT.

      • setRecordKeyList

        public void setRecordKeyList(ArrayList recordKeyList)
        Specifies the list of objects that will be used to preview BVT. If there is only one record, it will use filter clause to include pending records to show the effect of pending updates. If there is more than one record, the first record will be used as resulting record to preview before doing a merge.
        Parameters:
        recordKeyList - List of RecordKey of the data object that user wants to preview BVT.

      • getFilterClause

        public String getFilterClause()
        See corresponding setter method for details.
        See Also:
        setFilterClause(String)

      • setFilterClause

        public void setFilterClause(String filterClause)
        A SQL WHERE clause that can be applied to the XREF table. For example: "interaction_id=100 and hub_state_ind in (0,1)".

      • setEffectiveDate

        public void setEffectiveDate(Date effectiveDate)
        Specifies the date for which the values of the base object will be returned. The values are effective at the specified point in time.

        Parameters:
        effectiveDate - the base object values that are effective on this date

      • setHistoryDate

        public void setHistoryDate(Date historyDate)
        Specifies the date for which the values of the base object will be returned. The values returned are based at this point in history.

        Parameters:

      • isPromotePairedXrefs

        public boolean isPromotePairedXrefs()

      • setPromotePairedXrefs

        public void setPromotePairedXrefs(boolean promotePairedXrefs)
        Specifies if Promote of Paired Pending XREFs required before calculation. The Promote must be executed only in scope of the Preview calculation, no changes in real data.
        Parameters:
        promotePairedXrefs - TRUE for Promote execution
